mapper.select: select c.comment_id, c.title, c.content, c.created_date, m.nickname from product_comment c left outer join member m on c.member_id=m.member_id order by c.comment_id desc
select comment_id, product_id, member_id, title, content, created_date from product_comment where comment_id=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into product_comment(product_id, member_id, title, content, created_date) values(#{productNo}, #{memberNo}, #{title}, #{content}, now())
mapper.update: update product_comment set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, where comment_id=#{commentNo}
